T02D3650:262a-1: sim ha n'a da s'a dha nam /
T02D3650:262a-4: 'jig rten mgon po la phyag 'tshal lo //
T02D3650:262a-5: gang zhig sngags shes pa'i sngags pa des /
T02D3650:262a-6: brdzun rnam pa thams cad du spang bar bya'o ;
T02D3650:262a-7: / dang por dus bzhi kha dag par bkrus te /
T02D3650:262a-8: shin tu gnas dben par bris sku la sogs pa'i thad du dkyil 'khor byas te /
T02D3650:262a-9: mchod pa mang po phul la stan bde ba la 'dug ste /
T02D3650:262a-10: tshad med pa bzhi bsgom mo //
T02D3650:262a-11: de nas bdag gi snying gar tsam las zla bar
T02D3650:262a-12: gyur pa'i hr'i:dkar po bsams pa'i 'od kyis nam mkhar
T02D3650:262a-13: bla ma dang sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa'
T02D3650:262a-14: gsal bar snang bar byas la /
T02D3650:262a-15: yang de'i 'od 'phros pa las byung ba'i mchod pa'i sprin gyis mchod la phyag byas te /
T02D3650:262a-16: sdig pa bshags shing rjes su yi rang nas /
T02D3650:262a-17: dkon mchog gsum la skyabs su gsol te /
T02D3650:262a-18: rgyal ba'i lam la gnas pas byang chub tu sems bskyed de /
T02D3650:262a-19: 'od slar 'dus pas thams cad stong pa nyid du bsgoms te /
T02D3650:262a-20: aom sva bh'a wa shuddh'a:sarba dharm'a:sva bh'a wa shuddho& ham /
T02D3650:262a-21: aom sh'u n+ya t'a dzny'an badzrasva bh'a wa a'atma ko& ham /
T02D3650:262a-23: de nas myur du pam las padma dmar por aa
T02D3650:262a-24: las gyur pa'i seng ge'i gdan gyi steng du tsam
T02D3650:262a-25: las byung ba'i zla ba'i dkyil 'khor du hr'i:las seng
T02D3650:262a-26: ge'i sgra zhal gcig phyag gnyis sku mdog dkar po
T02D3650:262a-27: dbu skra'i cod pan can dang /
T02D3650:262a-28: snang ba mtha' yas kyi dbu rgyan can /
T02D3650:262a-30: phyed skyil du rgyal po chen po'i bzhugs thabs su bzhugs pa /
T02D3650:262b-0: phyag g-yon gyi phyag mthil sa la sbyar @262b ba'i
T02D3650:262b-1: mtheb mdzub kyis ral gris mtshan pa'i padma bzang po'i
T02D3650:262b-3: de'i ngos su gzhan yang bhandha dkar po dri zhim
T02D3650:262b-4: pa'i me tog sna tshogs kyis bkang ba'i padma'i yu
T02D3650:262b-6: phyag g-yas pa pus mo la brten te brkyang pa
T02D3650:262b-7: la brten par tri sh'u la sbrul dkar pos dkris
T02D3650:262b-8: pa yod cing / bsam gtan mdzad pa'i tshul can
T02D3650:262b-9: dbu'i thad ka nas rigs lnga'i sangs rgyas 'phro ba
T02D3650:262b-10: pa yod cing / bsgoms la / snying ga'i zla
T02D3650:262b-11: bar hr'i:bsams pa dza:h'um gis ye shes sems dpa' bkug
T02D3650:262b-12: pa yod cing / bsgoms la / ste / bam
T02D3650:262b-13: gyis dbang du byas nas ho:sa dgyes pa bskyed par
T02D3650:262b-14: pa yod cing / bsgoms la / ste / bsam
T02D3650:262b-15: mo // de nas 'dzab ni aom a'a:hr'i:sim ha n'a
T02D3650:262b-16: pa yod cing / bsgoms la / ste / bsam
